alert.note: Alert for Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:13PM EDT until June 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson County in south central Indiana... North central Clark County in south central Indiana... Scott County in south central Indiana... Northern Washington County in south central Indiana... Northern Trimble County in central Kentucky... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 712 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Scottsburg to 8 miles northeast of Paoli, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Scottsburg, Salem, Bedford, Vienna, Austin, Lexington, Hanover, Saluda and Smyrna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.
